html:
Reservation Confirmation

Confirmation #: {{ doc.name }}

Guest Information

Name:{{ doc.full_name or '' }}
Company:{{ doc.company or '' }}
Email:{{ doc.email_address or '' }}
Phone:{{ doc.phone_number or '' }}

Stay Details

{% if doc.room %} {% endif %}
Check-in Date:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.check_in_date, {"fieldtype": "Date"}) }}
Check-in Time:{{ doc.check_in_time or '14:00' }}
Check-out Date:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.check_out_date, {"fieldtype": "Date"}) }}
Check-out Time:{{ doc.check_out_time or '11:00' }}
Duration:{{ doc.days or 0 }} night(s)
Room Type:{{ doc.room_type or '' }}
Room:{{ doc.room }}
Guests:{{ doc.no_of_guests or 1 }}

Rate Information

{% if doc.rate_type %} {% endif %}
Rate Type:{{ doc.rate_type }}
Rate per Night:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.rent, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }}
Total:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_rent, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }}

Status: {{ doc.status or '' }}

Thank you for your reservation. We look forward to welcoming you!
name: Reservation Confirmation
